metadata.author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Google Cloud Platform BigQuery

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
Name of the custom Google Cloud Platform BigQuery Connector.
Enter the Google Cloud Platform API Endpoint, e.g. https://bigquery.googleapis.com

properties.description: Logic App connector for Google Cloud Platform (GCP) BigQuery API.

info.title: GCPBigQuery
info.description: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) BigQuery is a fully managed, serverless data warehouse solution offered by Google Cloud. is a scalable, fast, and cost-effective cloud data warehousing solution to store, process, and analyze large and complex datasets at scale.

parameters.name: minCreationTime
parameters.description: Min value for job creation time, in milliseconds since the POSIX epoch. If set, only jobs created after or at this timestamp are returned.

parameters.name: maxCreationTime
parameters.description: Max value for job creation time, in milliseconds since the POSIX epoch. If set, only jobs created before or at this timestamp are returned.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An expression for filtering the results of the request by label.

parameters.name: allUsers
parameters.description: Whether to display jobs owned by all users in the project. Default False.

parameters.name: parentJobId
parameters.description: If set, show only child jobs of the specified parent. Otherwise, show all top level jobs.

parameters.name: stateFilter
parameters.description: Filter for job state. done, pending, running.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description: Restrict information returned to a set of selected fields (full, minimal). Default full.

metadata.description: Name of the logic app connector which performs GCP BigQuery actions.
Enter Google Cloud Platform BigQuery ProjectID.
Enter Google Cloud Platform BigQuery DatasetID.
Enter Google Cloud Platform BigQuery TableID.
Enter Watchlist Alias. This should be unique from existing watchlists.

inputs.name: OutputMessage
inputs.value: Logic App failure caused by Create Watchlist step failure. Check the logic app run for detailed error. @{workflow()?['run']}

inputs.name: OutputMessage
inputs.value: Logic App failed or cancelled or timedout with following message: @{body('Parse_JSON_for_error')?['error']?['message']} Check the logic app run for detailed error. @{workflow()?['run']}

inputs.name: OutputMessage
inputs.value: Logic App failed with following message: @{body('Parse_error_JSON')?['error']?['message']} Check the logic app run for detailed error. @{workflow()?['run']}

metadata.title: Google Cloud Platform BigQuery - Create Wtchlist with BigQuery Table Data
metadata.description: This playbook can be run from incident context manually or from automation rule to create a watchlist from GCP BigQuery table data.
prerequisites: 1. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, GCPBigQuery Custom Connector needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
2. Refer to [GCP BigQuery Logic App Custom Connector](../../CustomConnector/GCPBigQueryCustomConnector/readme.md) documentation for deployment and setup instructions.
postDeployment: 2. Assign Microsoft Sentinel Contributor Role to playbook.

metadata.description: Name of the logic app connector which performs GCP BigQuery actions.
Enter base SQL Query to fetch data from BigQuery Table.
Enter BigQuery table column name (mapped to IP, URL, DNS etc entities) to filter the result based on those incident entities.
Enter Google Cloud Platform BigQuery ProjectID.

inputs.name: OutputMessage
inputs.value: Query failed or cancelled or timedout with following message: @{body('Parse_error_JSON')?['error']?['message']} Check the logic app run for detailed error. @{workflow()?['run']}

metadata.title: Google Cloud Platform BigQuery - Enrich Incident with BigQuery Table Data
metadata.description: This playbook can be run from incident context manually or from automation rule to query the GCP BigQuery table and enrich the incident with query results. Query result is filtered based on provided entities.
prerequisites: 1. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, GCPBigQuery Custom Connector needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
2. Refer to [GCP BigQuery Logic App Custom Connector](../../CustomConnector/GCPBigQueryCustomConnector/readme.md) documentation for deployment and setup instructions.
postDeployment: 2. Assign Microsoft Sentinel Responder Role to playbook.

metadata.description: Name of the logic app connector which performs GCP BigQuery actions.
Enter Google Cloud Platform BigQuery ProjectID.
Enter SQL Query to fetch data from BigQuery Table.

inputs.name: OutputMessage
inputs.value: Query failed or cancelled or timedout with following message: @{body('Parse_error_JSON')?['error']?['message']} Check the logic app run for detailed error. @{workflow()?['run']}

metadata.title: Google Cloud Platform BigQuery - Query BigQuery Table
metadata.description: This playbook can be run from incident context manually or from automation rule to query the GCP BigQuery table and enrich the incident with results.
prerequisites: 1. Prior to the deployment of this playbook, GCPBigQuery Custom Connector needs to be deployed under the same subscription.
2. Refer to [GCP BigQuery Logic App Custom Connector](../../CustomConnector/GCPBigQueryCustomConnector/readme.md) documentation for deployment and setup instructions.
postDeployment: 2. Assign Microsoft Sentinel Responder Role to playbook.

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

Google Cloud Platform BigQuery is a completely serverless and cost-effective enterprise data warehouse that works across clouds and scales with your data, with BI, machine learning and AI built in. Integrating it with Microrsoft sentinel will give the ability to enrich incident, create watch list for close monitoring and fetch big query results as part of incident remediation process.

Custom Azure Logic Apps Connectors: 1, Playbooks: 3

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
